amendment.description: Amendment clarifies the intent of Congress that the nuclear cooperation into which the governments of the United States and India would enter is for peaceful, productive purposes, not military purposes.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 2 printed in Part B of House Report 109-599 to reinforce the intent of Congress that the nuclear cooperation into which t he governments of the United States and India would enter is for peaceful, productive purposes, not military.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Stearns amendment (A003) Agreed to by recorded vote: 414 - 0 (Roll no. 407).
